g.text: You are a beer drinker. You need to drink as much
beer as possible. Use W key to jump, A to move left
and D to move right. Your wives are going to stop
you on the way. Use spacebar to shoot and kill them.
Pick up the beers and go to the next bar quickly.
You can earn double points in drunk mode!
Press C for cheat-mode and T for a surprise.
